main.title: Hi, I'm Mathieu
main.subtitle: Frontend developer & Css lover
main.quotetext: Here is a small project using Javascript and  API where you can have a random quote if you feel in need ...
main.multitext: For this one I use mainly Javascript and Css to create a multistep form where you can add your plan
main.tipstext: Another one, I always try to find the just price to give to someone so in case you need to calculate and split the bill here is a great JS tips calculator
main.reviewtext: Still training my Js skills with this submit review just to give someone a big 5
main.scantext: Psst....if you need more informations, you can use your phone and scan here, pretty simple project but don't miss the chance to connect
main.moretext: I worked on some big project during my time at my previous agency it was great can't wait to keep going
